        public UColorTool addGradient(int min,
                     int max,
                     int _col1,
                     int _col2)
        Adds gradient to palette. User must specify the minimum and maximum number of colors the gradient should generate when building a random color palette.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum number of colors this gradient should produce
        max - Maximum number of colors this gradient should produce
        _col1 -
        _col2 -
        Returns:

      • generateColors

        public void generateColors(int minimum)
        Generates randomized palette. All single colors that have been added are automatically included. For each gradient a random number of interpolated (t=0..1) colors is generated, decided by the user-provided minimum and maximum number.
        Parameters:
        minimum - Mininum Minimum number of colors that must be generated. If this number is not reached generateColors() is called again.

      • generateColors

        public void generateColors(int minimum,
                  int skipGradientChance)
        Generates randomized palette. All single colors that have been added are automatically included. For each gradient the function makes a decision whether or not to include it, with the odds specified by the parameter skipGradientChance. if random(100) < skipGradientChance the gradient is passed over for this palette. added.
        Parameters:
        minimum -
        skipGradientChance -

      • generateColors

        public void generateColors()
        Generates randomized palette.

      • toHSB

        public static final float[] toHSB(int col,
            float[] hsb)
        Returns the HSB representation of a RGB color. If the parameter "hsb" is null a new array will be created, otherwise the existing array is used. Brightness and saturation is returned in the ranges 0..255, while hue is has the range 0..360.
        Parameters:
        col -
        hsb -
        Returns:

      • toUVec3

      • fromHSB

        public static final int fromHSB(float[] hsb)
        Calculates RGB from a HSB representation.
        Parameters:
        palette -
        hsb - Array of three floats, containing hue (in the range 0..360), saturation and brightness (both in the range 0.255).
        Returns:
        RGB value

      • fromHSB

        public static final int fromHSB(float h,
          float s,
          float b)
        Calculates RGB from a HSB representation.
        Parameters:
        h - Hue (in the range 0..360)
        s - Saturation (in the range 0..255)
        b - Brightness (in the range 0..255)
        Returns:
        RGB value
